story_20_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hmm... I feel like I should have run into some of
those stolen Pokémon by now... How much deeper
does this cave go?
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Don’t go running too far ahead! We agreed we’d
do this together, didn’t we?
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oops. Sorry, I’m not really used to working in
big groups.
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Well, we’re deep inside Team Break’s hideout
now... Of course we’re gonna worry if you
take off on your own.
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Misty... Maybe that’s just Calem’s way of
looking out for us.
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I think you’re worried about us, too, Calem.
That’s why you wanted to walk ahead—
to make sure it’s safe, right?
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Maybe...
In any case, we need to keep moving.
story_20_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
C-Calem! Wait, we’re coming, too!
Ugh... Come on, let’s follow after him—
story_20_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Who said you could poke your noses around
here, huh?! This is our turf!
story_20_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Oh no, this is NOT what we need right now!
We have to find Calem before he gets too far
ahead of us!
story_20_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Then let’s make quick work of these thugs!
Come on, Misty and [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
